name: AIDA: The Beginning of the Story
name_original: AIDA: The Beginning of the Story
description:
AIDA: The Beginning of the Story is first-person adventure puzzle game.
Interact with objects, solve puzzles, and go through the story.
Reveal the secret of the queen's death and save the kingdom in danger.

*Game Features
-First person point of view, you can immerse yourself in the story.
-You can change the operation with the mouse right click. Use it to suit your situation.
-You can change mouse sensitivity in settings.
-There are various puzzles and objects waiting for each map.
-Watch the antique medieval space.
